abstract: 'The closest we came to losing a battle in Vietnam.'
description: Kevin Brady sets the record straight on the Battle of Bribie, considered to be the closest Australia got to losing a battle in Vietnam. His "digger's account" illustrates the major obstactles and the bravery shown by the men, who were met with gunfire on landing.
